args: On goes the blush, followed by powder,\nand finally I blend while thinking\nbeautiful thoughts... There! I did it!
She's serving face, face, face! Great job.\nI'd say you've mastered your make-up\nfundamentals, Mercury.
I'm so happy you've started coming by\nfor my little pointers. What changed?
Oh, I... I suppose I just started to feel as if\nI'd put up a bit of a wall, so I decided to\nintentionally interact with others more.
I had already thought the Halidom a lovely\nplace, but the many and varied people\nhere have all been so open and generous.
I'm glad to hear it. One beautiful act leads\nto another, and soon we're all sparkling!\nCome by for another session anytime.
Oh, I will. In fact, I should make an\nappointment while I'm—hm?
Crudcakes, we're in turbo trouble!\nMercury, you in here?!
I am. What has you in such a state?
We just got word that imperial forces have\ninvaded Saint Lotier.  We've been running\naround in a frenzy trying to find you!
Ranzal and the others are already on their\nway there now. Let us follow, and quickly.
Yes, of course. Nothing comes before\ndefending my beloved city!
Spare them no mercy, men. Let all\nwho stand in the way fall to your blades!\nShow them the folly of defying the Empire!
Our poor city... Those Dyrenell dogs!
A one-sided slaughter perpetrated by\nmen deaf to the pleas of the weak...\nThis is savagery!
Truly, humankind is weak, determined to\nrepeat its sad and foolish history. I must\nsee that at least this city's people live on.
Men and women of the Empire's forces!\nI will allow no further barbarism here.\nYou now face me!
Rgh, it's that damned dragon, Mercury!\nMen, stand your ground. Now, advance!
Damn those animals. Great Waterwyrm,\nwe shall fight at your side!
No. There's no need for that.\nI ask that you seek shelter instead.
I do not wish to see any more of you hurt.\nPlease, heed my wishes and fall back!
Boundless waters, I command you:\nbring your judgment crashing down\nupon the wicked! Hydrocannon!
Accursed dragon. It will be YOU who\nis brought to heel this day. Men!\nReady the beast!
This Deathglass has been augmented\ninto a living, dragon-slaying weapon.\nNow, loose the fiend upon them!
Rgh! If I move out of its path, it will barrel\ninto the people behind me. I'll have to\nweather its assault mysel—aaugh!
Nrrgh... A single attack, and already I\nfalter. They weren't bluffing when they\ncalled it a dragon-slaying weapon.
But I am the guardian of this city!\nDuty demands I protect Saint Lotier's\nweakest...even if it costs me everything.
You... You would shield me with your\nhuman bodies?! But the risk is far too—
We do it gladly. No peril could stop\nus from protecting you, lady dragon!
Yeah! You keep the city and all of our\nfamilies here safe. None of us want\nto see you get hurt, either!
We may not be strong enough to fend off\nanything you can't, but at least let us help.\nFor the sake of all we love here!
We shall be your shield, great Waterwyrm.\nGrant us the honor of fighting at your side!
I see man's true strength in your\nunwavering gaze.
Alone, you lack in might, but you have love\nand courage both. I am long overdue in\nrevising my assessment of humankind.
Until now, I'd simply assessed the division\nof power between us and unilaterally\ndecided your kind needed my protection.
But now I see there was no need for\nme to foist my protection upon you.\nYou possess a strength all your own.
Then you'll allow us to stand and fight\nbeside you?
Because I still wish to protect this city\nand the citizens I cherish so deeply.
That single purpose allows me to tap into\na deeper well of strength than I have ever\nknown. You've shown me that today!
Whorling blue, answer my call and grant\nme the power to save my beloved Saint\nLotier! AQUA SPIRAL!
What kind of trump card is this?! We'll not\nsurvive a direct hit. All forces, RETREAT!
That's our Waterwyrm! Just look at those\nimperial jackals turn tail and run. And the\nwhole city's—wait. Lady dragon?
Guardian dragon! No... Please don't\ntell me you expended all your power\nto unleash that last attack!
Don't fret over me. As long as\nthe city and her people are safe...\nWhatever happens...to me is...
